EmailTemplate.description: DNBI Credit Information Update for Lead
EmailTemplate.name: DNBI Credit Information Update for Lead
EmailTemplate.subject: Credit Application Status Update for {!Lead.Company}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: A Credit Decision has been updated on {!Lead.Company} for credit application {!Lead.DNBI__DnB_Application_ID__c}. Please review the updated credit decision.Click to view the record. Note: You can search the credit application ID in the main search box on Salesforce.com.
